reviews.customers_say: Customers find these underwear comfortable, with one noting they don't rub against sensitive areas, and many describing them as super soft and sexy-looking. The quality is excellent, and customers consider the price worth it. Regarding size, while some find them a good fit, others mention they run big. The durability receives mixed feedback - while some say they hold up well to washing, others report issues with fabr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Breathable and sophisticated
items.body: These bikini panties feel like a second skin ‚Äî stretchy but secure, with that signature Calvin Klein waistband that adds a sleek touch. Perfect for everyday wear, whether you‚Äôre rushing to school drop-off or winding down with a ritual bath. üí´ Feminine comfort that doesn‚Äôt sacrifice style. Read more
items.author: Val

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Panties!
items.body: Fit as expected. Breathable and comfortable and did not shrink in the wash. Material was thick and of good strong quality. Read more
items.author: Thomas Kowacz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars staple

items.author: Tiana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you are debating between a medium and a large....
items.body: I am 5'9" and 145 pounds. A size small or size 4 is a little snug on me but a size medium or 6 is a little loose. I am right in the middle! I ordered a size large in the cotton thong panty because their size guide recommended a large according to my measurements. I also thought ordering a size large would be a good idea, because the Calvin Klein bikini panty in a size medium is too small for me. The large was too big. I exchanged one of my large packs for a medium and they fit perfect. The only thing I don't like about these thongs is that the tag is in the front and can be irritable. It would be great if they went tagless! Read more
items.author: Stalnaker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: My new favorite underwear! so uncomfortable and don‚Äôt dig into you kinda pricey but soooo worth it to be comfortable Read more
items.author: alyssa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars my undergarment rebrand
items.body: As I slowly begin to my accept I am in my mid-twenties and aging, I‚Äôve realized that the underwear I purchased 12 years ago at PINK during the 5 for $25 deal may not be built to last a 13th year. It‚Äôs a hard pill to swallow accepting the ‚ÄúNaughty for the Night‚Äù g-string I hid from my parents in 10th grade, isn‚Äôt suitable for me anymore - talk about a quarter-life crisis. Thus, I‚Äôve resulted to Amazon to rebrand my underwear drawer. I always forget that underwear can be sneaky expensive if you‚Äôre not buying the Fruit of the Loom value pack from Walmart. I found these to be the best deal for the price and quality of product. They are basically wedgie proof and can be worn in all settings. When I don‚Äôt sleep in my home and lack access to my Walmart value pack Fruit of the Looms, these are comfortable to sleep in and far more attractive to male suitors. Given I‚Äôm way too lazy to wash underwear separately on delicate, I can confidently say these thongs have withstood multiple washes with my normal clothes. Will purchase again. Read more
items.author: Lexie :)

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Calidad
items.body: Siempre los compro buena calidad Read more
items.author: Claudia Gato

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black/Grey Heather/Nymph's Thigh/Obsess/Candy Cane, Tomato/Twinkle/Grey Heather/Black, Cedar/Grey Heather/Black With Heart Stripes, Iris Orchid/Vanilla Ice/Iceland Blue, Black/Shoreline/Ck Logo, Black/Scorched Denim/Dragon Fly/Charcoal Htr/Diagonal Logo Black, Black/Grey Heather/Archetype Diagonal Logo Nymph's Thigh, Kelly Green/Charcoal/Ck Spark Black, Ranier Stripe/Strawberry Shake/Black, Black / Orchid Petal / Reflected Logo_white/Orchid Petal, Grey Heather/White/Emmy Stripe Black, Tapioca/Star Stamp Exact Red/Black, Evolve / Grey Heather / Seersucker Stripe_evolve, Nymph's Thigh/Blue Fog/Mini Ck Gry Htr. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
